title: Room Presence
description: Occupancy patterns by apartment and day

panels.title: Apt 1 — Daily Presence Ratio
panels.query: SELECT date, presence_ratio FROM fact_presence_daily WHERE apt_id = 'apt1' ORDER BY date

panels.title: Apt 2 — Daily Presence Ratio
panels.query: SELECT date, presence_ratio FROM fact_presence_daily WHERE apt_id = 'apt2' ORDER BY date

panels.title: Presence Ratio Comparison
panels.query: SELECT date, apt_id, presence_ratio FROM fact_presence_daily ORDER BY date
